content.prompt: Which of the following was a consequence of blockbusting in North American cities?

choices.label: European immigrants moved into housing vacated by upwardly mobile Americans.
Poor residents were unable to acquire mortgages.

unit.text: 6: Cities and Urban Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain a likely outcome in a geographic scenario using geographic concepts, processes, models, or theories.
